mapper.sql: select id, verss, isdel, createtime, createuse, updatetime, updateuse, yhid, nd, zfs from wf_rykhfsb
mapper.select: SELECT khfsb.id, khfsb.verss, khfsb.isdel, khfsb.createtime, khfsb.createuse, khfsb.updatetime, khfsb.updateuse, u.user_id yhid, ifnull(khfsb.nd, #{nd}) as nd, u.nick_name yhxm, dept.dept_name bmmc, ifnull(khfsb.zfs,0) as zfs FROM sys_user u left join (select * from wf_rykhfsb where nd=#{nd}) khfsb on u.user_id=khfsb.yhid left join sys_dept dept on dept.dept_id = u.dept_id where u.del_flag = 0 and u.user_name != 'admin' and u.nick_name like concat('%', #{yhxm}, '%') and khfsb.zfs >= #{minfs} and khfsb.zfs <= #{maxfs}

select a.id, a.verss, a.isdel, a.createtime, a.createuse, a.updatetime, a.updateuse, a.yhid, a.nd, a.zfs, b.id as sub_id, b.verss as sub_verss, b.isdel as sub_isdel, b.createtime as sub_createtime, b.createuse as sub_createuse, b.updatetime as sub_updatetime, b.updateuse as sub_updateuse, b.rykhfsbid as sub_rykhfsbid, b.fslx as sub_fslx, b.fs as sub_fs, b.ywid as sub_ywid, b.bz as sub_bz from wf_rykhfsb a left join wf_rykhfsxqb b on b.rykhfsbid = a.id where a.id = #{id}

SELECT xqb.id, date_format(xqb.createtime,'%y-%m-%d') createtimeg, xqb.createuse, xqb.updateuse, date_format(xqb.updatetime,'%y-%m-%d') updatetimeg, xqb.fslx, CASE xqb.fslx WHEN '1' THEN '加分' WHEN '2' THEN '减分' WHEN '3' THEN '初始化' ELSE '其他' END AS fslxmc, IFNULL( xqb.fs, 0 ) fs, xqb.ywid, xqb.bz, u1.nick_name createUserName, u2.nick_name updateUserName FROM wf_rykhfsxqb xqb LEFT JOIN wf_rykhfsb fsb ON xqb.rykhfsbid = fsb.id LEFT JOIN sys_user u1 ON u1.user_id = xqb.createuse LEFT JOIN sys_user u2 ON u2.user_id = xqb.updateuse WHERE xqb.isdel = 0 AND xqb.rykhfsbid = #{id}
mapper.insert:
insert into wf_rykhfsb
id, verss, isdel, createtime, createuse, updatetime, updateuse, yhid, nd, zfs,
#{id}, #{verss}, #{isdel}, #{createtime}, #{createuse}, #{updatetime}, #{updateuse}, #{yhid}, #{nd}, #{zfs},
mapper.delete:
delete from wf_rykhfsb where id in
#{id}

delete from wf_rykhfsxqb where rykhfsbid in
#{rykhfsbid}
mapper.insert:
insert into wf_rykhfsxqb( id, verss, isdel, createtime, createuse, updatetime, updateuse, rykhfsbid, fslx, fs, ywid, bz) values
( #{item.id}, #{item.verss}, #{item.isdel}, #{item.createtime}, #{item.createuse}, #{item.updatetime}, #{item.updateuse}, #{item.rykhfsbid}, #{item.fslx}, #{item.fs}, #{item.ywid}, #{item.bz})
